text:
I'm pretty sure this isn't possible..but maybe you are more magical than me.  

How can I create a HubSpot contact record from a contacts property.
<@U25PYL3Q8> are you trying to take contact info from one field/multiple fields and then create an entire new record from it?
I think that is what I'm trying to do <@U25FVEBJS>
The work flows won't do it. They won't take a field and move it to another field (as far as I can tell) I would export, run a macro in excel and reimport
We are registering people for courses, and the person with the HubSpot account is registering for his employees
You might consider an external database to do the work for you and connect via zapier or something like that.
Yeah, they are on an extreme budget.
Using the api wasn't an option
if the budget is the concern then I would do it manually by exporting, macro then reimport
It sucks to do things manually, though
